title: THE DUTCH FATHER
content: Katrina and Jan get up very early in the morning. Their father and mother get up early too. Their father goes out in his fishing boat. He is gone all day. At sunset, he comes home. Katrina and Jan run to meet him. Sometimes they run on the high dike. They tell their father all that has happened during the day.

book.title: Windmills and wooden shoes
book.description: 简介： In Windmills and Wooden Shoes we have a continuous story of the doings of the Dutch children, Jan and Katrina and their little friends....
